org.cooperari.config

Annotation Type CInstrument


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface CInstrument
    Configure bytecode instrumentation.

    Specific classes may be indicated by classes() and whole packages by packages().

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Class<?>[] classes 
      boolean ltwDump 
      String ltwOptions 
      String[] packages 
      boolean self 
      boolean selfInnerClasses 
      boolean selfWholePackage 

    • Element Detail

      • self

        public abstract boolean self
        Returns:
        Whether to instrument the class that is annotated (typically yes).
        Default:
        true

      • selfInnerClasses

        public abstract boolean selfInnerClasses
        Returns:
        Whether to instrument inner classes for the class that is annotated (typically yes).
        Default:
        true

      • selfWholePackage

        public abstract boolean selfWholePackage
        Returns:
        Whether to instrument classes in the same package as the one that is annotated.
        Default:
        true

      • classes

        public abstract Class<?>[] classes
        Returns:
        Specific classes to instrument.
        Default:
        {}

      • packages

        public abstract String[] packages
        Returns:
        Packages to instrument. Every class found in each package specified in this manner will be instrumented.
        Default:
        {}

      • ltwDump

        public abstract boolean ltwDump
        Returns:
        Whether to dump bytecode during load-time weaving (used for debugging).
        Default:
        true

      • ltwOptions

        public abstract String ltwOptions
        Returns:
        Extra load-time weaving options (used for debugging).
        Default:
        ""
